short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension provides a mechanism to quickly and accurately add an endpoint to Rate Collate.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension is a helper to add endpoints onto the Rate Collate review aggregation service.

You have the option of just adding the business identifier, or with the new quick code functionality, you can pre-fill the relevant settings required to create an endpoint in just a couple of clicks.

Booking.com - Business Name and Identifier
Checkatrade - Business Name and Identifier
Expedia - Business Name and Identifier
Google - Business Name, Location, CID, PID and Identifier
Tripadvisor - Business Name and Identifier
Trustpilot - Business Name and Identifier
Trustatrader - Business Name and Identifier
Yell - Business Name and Identifier

This extension also offers extra features for Google endpoints:

The location setting within google is optional - if you allow location detection, then the server performing the lookups will utilise a location near the coordinates detected.

The CID and PID are used to determine that the correct GMB listing is selected. it also provides a target if the query yields multiple listings.
